articles.author: Jeff Perez
articles.title: Toyota Just Introduced Its First Electric Three-Row SUV - Motor1.com
articles.description: The 2027 Highlander goes electric-only for 2027 with an all-new design and a tech-heavy interior. Here are all the details.
articles.content: Toyota is upgrading its SUV arsenal with an all-new version of one of its most popular three-rows. The 2027 Toyota Highlander replaces the current fourth-generation model, which has been on sale in t… [+4959 chars]
